title: I am Tom Moody
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Conflict (Psychology)

abstract: The awful solitude of the spotlight forces a musician to confront his inner critic.
description: As the performer steps up to the microphone, will the desire to make music be defeated by fears of failure and feelings of inadequacy? The awful solitude of the spotlight forces Tom to confront his inner critic. Written, directed and animated by Ainslie Henderson. Voices: Mackenzie Crook, Jude Crook, Rick Webster Music: Peter Deane Compositing: Will Anderson Sound design: Ainslie Henderson, Joe Acheson
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003006; Commonwealth Connections Animation Showcase; Active; 2014
